data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Box,
        Carousel,
        Center,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Carousel.Container
    class="carousel-orientation"
    orientation="vertical"
>
    <Carousel.Section>
        <Box palette="negative">
            <Center height="100">300 x 200</Center>
        </Box>
    </Carousel.Section>

    <Carousel.Section>
        <Box palette="affirmative">
            <Center height="100">300 x 200</Center>
        </Box>
    </Carousel.Section>

    <Carousel.Section>
        <Box palette="alert">
            <Center height="100">300 x 200</Center>
        </Box>
    </Carousel.Section>
</Carousel.Container>

<style>
    :global(.carousel-orientation) {
        width: 300px;
        height: 200px;
    }
</style>
data.title: Carousel Orientation
